spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githyanki makes two Greatsword or Telekinetic Bolt attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Telekinetic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) force damage.

bonus.name: Astral Step {@recharge 4}
entries: The githyanki teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
